description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Will Trent Season 3 Episode 15 Entertains As A Girls Gone Wilder Resort Trip Goes Horribly Wrong
description: While on a girls trip, Amanda and Evelyn discover a dead body on Will Trent Season 3 Episode 15. Check out our review of this entertaining case. The post Will Trent Season 3 Episode 15 Entertains As A Girls Gone Wilder Resort Trip Goes Horribly Wrong appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Laura Nowak

title: The Handmaid’s Tale Season 6 Episode 5 Review: The Mirror Named Janine
description: Everyone faces hard truths on The Handmaid's Tale S6E5, from June and Moira's trauma to Joseph's guilt and Serena's manipulations. The post The Handmaid’s Tale Season 6 Episode 5 Review: The Mirror Named Janine appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Hallmark Content Leaving Peacock on May 1, Ending Three-Year Partnership
description: Hallmark is bidding farewell to Peacock. (We hope they sent a card, at least.) Hallmark’s library of content is leaving the NBCUniversal streamer on May 1, TVLine has confirmed. That means original series like When Calls the Heart and The Way Home, as well as Hallmark’s extensive selection of holiday movies, will no longer be […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: The Golden Bachelor Renewed at ABC — and the New Leading Man Is a Former NFL Pro
description: ABC’s new Golden Bachelor is trading pigskins for rose petals. The senior-themed Bachelor offshoot has been renewed for a second season, TVLine has learned, with former NFL pro Mel Owens as the new leading man. The 66-year-old Owens follows in the footsteps of inaugural Golden Bachelor Gerry Turner, who starred in The Golden Bachelor’s freshman […]
author: Dave Nemetz
